column4: so all .. im trying to play a .wmv file .. i have installed medibuntu .. w32codec and libdvdcss with no change .. any ideas ?
i've tried kaffeine , mplayer , gxine .. nothing lets me play the file
maybe it's not a .wmv file, try command $ file to know
$ file /path/to/.wmvfile tell what exactly the filetype is, i think maybe it's not .wmv really
have you tried play the file with mplayer, it works just fine for me
so say i play it with mplayer .. i want to convert it to mpg so i can use devde to make it into a movie
you can use ffmpeg to convert
what is the command .. mplayer file1 ?
are you trying to play or convert the file?
play it first .. if it works then convert it
it won't i get an error .. "ProcessInputError "
in this situation, i dont know how to fix you prob, maybe your file is damaged. sorry!
maybe you should try $ffmpeg -i /path/to/file and tell me the result
the command will show you more details about the file
you download this file from internet? if so, i think the process is not successful, because the duration is very short, just about 5secs
